publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5086 Mr Jamie McGrigor: Marty Layman-Mendonca—That the Parliament sends its condolences to the family and friends of US primary school teacher, Marty Layman-Mendonca, who, having been left brain-damaged after being attacked while walking the Great Glen Way near Inverness in July 2006, has sadly died in the United States of America, and recognises the contribution of local people in Inverness and the Highlands who helped efforts to raise funds to pay for Ms Layman-Mendonca to be moved closer to her home. Supported by: Mrs Nanette Milne*, Alex Fergusson*, Alex Johnstone*, Dave Petrie*

S2M-5086 Mr Jamie McGrigor: Marty Layman-Mendonca—That the Parliament sends its condolences to the family and friends of US primary school teacher, Marty Layman-Mendonca, who, having been left brain-damaged after being attacked while walking the Great Glen Way near Inverness in July 2006, has sadly died in the United States of America, and recognises the contribution of local people in Inverness and the Highlands who helped efforts to raise funds to pay for Ms Layman-Mendonca to be moved closer to her home. Supported by: Mrs Nanette Milne, Alex Fergusson, Alex Johnstone, Dave Petrie, Robin Harper*, Shiona Baird*, Margaret Mitchell*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Nora Radcliffe*, Murdo Fraser*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr David Davidson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, John Swinburne*
